sentence: He has rejected the committee's two Republican members Representatives Liz Cheney of Wyoming and Adam Kinzinger of Illinois saying he no longer views them as part of the GOP.
author: Jason Lemon
title: Donald Trump's Jan. 6 Actions Qualify as 'Treason': Glenn Kirschner
